title: Yes, Officer - Disciplining the Police Chief's Daughter: An Erotic Short Story
description: Not wanting to be known as just “The Police Chief’s Daughter,” Kylie Morgan spent her teenage years developing a reputation for being a troublemaker. Now twenty, her naughty streak hasn’t worn off, but she’s gotten careless—and is about to pay for it.When a handsome cop catches her in the middle of a crime, Kylie has to make a decision. Will she let her father find out what she’s done, and risk jail time? Or will she do the unthinkable and let the officer have his way with her in the back of the police car? Either way, Kylie knows that she is going to have to face VERY severe consequences….
author: Imogen Creed
